column1: Baby Barnaby's////New favorite brunch spot in Houston! Be prepared to wait on a weekend but the clipboard system is efficient and there are a couple of benches and complimentary water in the waiting area. Indoor and outdoor seating is available
column2: with the inside being small but quaint. Now onto the food.. the green eggs are delicious! I didn't have a single complaint about anything on the plate
column3: everything was cooked to perfection from the eggs to the sausage and potatoes
column4: which were plentiful. My table also ordered the banana walnut pancakes to share
column5: which were just as yummy! Bananas were inside the batter so you get a little taste of it with every bite. The service was quick even though all tables were full. Only downside is parking
column6: which can be found on nearby streets. Five stars in my book!
